meanings.sent1: She renormalized her daily routine after the vacation.
meanings.sent2: The mechanic renormalized the engine to improve its performance.
meanings.sent3: After eating too much cake, he renormalized his diet to include more vegetables.
meanings.sent4: The therapist helped her renormalize her thoughts and emotions.
meanings.sent5: The teacher renormalized the classroom rules to create a better learning environment.

meanings.definition: Adjust or modify to bring back to a normal state.
meanings.sent1: He renormalized the temperature in the room to make it more comfortable.
meanings.sent2: The scientist renormalized the data to account for the error.
meanings.sent3: The chef renormalized the recipe to make it healthier.
meanings.sent4: She renormalized her sleeping schedule to get more rest.
meanings.sent5: The artist renormalized the colors in the painting to make it more vibrant.
